meanings: Verb (고개몸 등이 다른 방향을 향하도록) 돌리다, 몸을 돌리다, 돌아서다 (→turn over)

vlive.korean: '잘 됐네!' "It turned out well!" 듣기 View video NU'EST : 뉴이스트와 스푼즈가 함께하는 Special V LIVE [THE NU'STORE]

vlive.english: Oh, Woong turned on live, too?

vlive.korean: 뭐요? - 와 잘 됐다! What is it? - Wow! It turned out well! 듣기 View video NU'EST : 뉴이스트와 스푼즈가 함께하는 Special V LIVE [THE NU'STORE]
vlive.english: What is it? - Wow! It turned out well!

examples.korean: He turned around and retraced his steps. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 돌아서서 왔던 길을 되돌아 갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He turned around and retraced his steps. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He turned away to hide his blushes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 얼굴이 빨개지는 것을 감추려고 고개를 돌렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He turned away to hide his blushes. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The car clipped the kerb as it turned. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 승용차가 방향을 돌리다가 연석에 부딪쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The car clipped the kerb as it turned. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She turned luxuriantly on her side, yawning. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 하품을 하며 느긋이 옆으로 돌아누웠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She turned luxuriantly on her side, yawning. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She denied that she had turned traitor. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 자신이 반역자가 되었다는 것을 부인했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She denied that she had turned traitor. Add to Wordbook
